lastfm.summary: "Codo" is a song by the German musical group Döf, released in 1984. The group, which was formed in 1983, was a collaborative project between members of various German bands, and "Codo" remains one of their most well-known tracks. The song's catchy melody and quirky, humorous lyrics helped it become a hit in Germany and internationally. Döf's sound blends new wave and electronic pop, characteristic of the early 1980s music scene. Musical Style The song is a blend of electronic pop Read more on Last.fm.
